alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area; Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Misty Fjords (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 8:58PM AKST until January 10 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches. For Hyder, total snow accumulations of 24 to 36 inches. * WHERE...Hyder, Haines, Haines Highway, and Yakutat. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing and drifting snow may make removal difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a chance snow could mix with freezing rain at times. A change over to rain could happen on Monday, perhaps late Sunday night in Yakutat, and would come with a wind shift to the south. If the wind shift does not happen then additional snow should be expected.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
